description: This Java class defines a utility for managing per-request API context using ThreadLocal storage. It provides methods to retrieve and clear the context associated with the current thread.

classes.name: ApiRequestContextHolder
classes.description: A utility class that manages thread-local storage of ApiRequestContext objects, allowing per-request contextual data management in a thread-safe manner.

methods.name: clearContext
methods.description: Removes the ApiRequestContext associated with the current thread.

methods.name: getContext
methods.description: Retrieves the ApiRequestContext associated with the current thread, creating a new one if none exists.
